query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST301 ( MANDT, CS301_TEM, CS301_RDT, CS301_SEQ, CS301_SIR, CS301_PST, CS301_BSU, CS301_CDT, CS301_MDT, CS301_MID, CS301_PRT, CS301_NAM, CS301_SPT, CS301_ADR, CS301_PJT, CS301_SPC, CS301_PRD, CS301_CDY, CS301_CPD, CS301_CND, CS301_SRG, CS301_GBU, CS301_YGB, CS301_BLD, CS301_PDT, CS301_CNT, CS301_FLR, CS301_SPD, CS301_SYR, CS301_HYN, CS301_DYN, CS301_CYN, CS301_RM1, CS301_RM2, CS301_DOC, CS301_DEL, CS301_MMN, CS301_DAT, CS301_FRT, CS301_STD, CS301_ETD, CS301_ZMAN, CS301_PNT, CS301_SAJ, CS301_GIS, CS301_TXT, CS301_TOT, CS301_GBN, CS301_MTM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #TEM#, SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,4), ( SELECT TRIM(REPEAT('0',4-LENGTH(TRIM(CHAR(INT(VALUE(MAX(CS301_SEQ),'0'))+1))))) || TRIM(CHAR(INT(VALUE(MAX(CS301_SEQ),'0'))+1)) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS301_TEM = #TEM# AND CS301_RDT = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,4) ), '01', 'A1', #BSU#, #CDT#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID#, 'N', #NAM#, #SPT#, #ADR#, #PJT#, #SPC#, #PRD#, SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(#ETD#, #STD#, '2'), #CPD#, #CND#, #SRG#, #GBU#, #YGB#, #BLD#, #PDT#, #CNT#, #FLR#, #SPD#, #SYR#, #HYN#, #DYN#, #CYN#, SUBSTRING(CAST(#RMK# AS VARCHAR(1100)),1 ,254, CODEUNITS32), SUBSTRING(CAST(#RMK# AS VARCHAR(1100)),255,508, CODEUNITS32), #DOC#, 'N', #MMN#, #DAT#, 'N', #STD#, #ETD#, #G_USER_NAME#, #PNT#, #SAJ#, #GIS#, #TXT#, #TOT#, '2', /* ½Â°­±â:'1', ÁÖÂ÷:'2' */ HEX(CURRENT TIME) )
